news.title: Sally Rooney unable to collect Sky Arts Award in person over Palestine Action arrest threats
news.summary: "I want to thank you all the more warmly for honouring my work tonight and to reiterate...my solidarity with the people of Palestine," Rooney said.

news.title: BÁITE to premiere at Newport Beach Film Festival
news.summary: The award-winning Irish film will be released in Irish cinemas in early 2026.

news.title: Chubby Cat, Winnie Ama and Eve Belle to perform at Sound of Belfast Festival 2025
news.summary: Sinéad O'Connor's album Universal Mother will also be honoured at the festival.

news.title: Pavement announce physical edition of the PAVEMENTS (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack) and best-of compilation
news.summary: The new physical LP will come out on November 14, while the compilation Hecklers Choice is out today.

news.title: Madonna returns to Warner Records for new album
news.summary: The upcoming dance album has been announced for 2026.

news.title: Machine Gun Kelly announces 3Arena tour date
news.summary: The tour follows the release of his seventh studio album, Lost Americana

news.title: Nicola Coughlan, Laura Whitmore and more speak out for Gaza at Together For Palestine concert
news.summary: "We know justice can't prevail if we do nothing, if we say nothing," said Laura Whitmore in her speech. "We all have responsibility to stand up for those who have been silenced."

news.title: Massive Attack to join Kneecap for their Wembley show tonight
news.summary: They will open the show with a “special audio/visual presentation” in support of Palestine.

news.title: JADE: "D’you know where I had an absolute ball? The Guinness Factory! I went with my security guard, bless him"
news.summary: Ahead of the release of her solo debut, ex-Little Mix member Jade discusses finding her voice as a solo artist, her connection to the queer community, and speaking out on the issues important to her.
